channel.title: Help with this siggy
channel.description:
[img]http://img516.imageshack.us/img516/5687/paidk0d3ni3drp9.png[/img]
How could I do this sig? Like what steps would I follow, I had a friend make it and I know it's not hard. I'm new in gfx sorry but I wanna figure this out.
Also while I'm here I also have a pen problem, when I use it it tends to fill in spaces when I mess with it. Helps appreciated, John
Also, forgot to add I'm using photoshop cs3

item.title: Help with this siggy
item.dc:creator: @_J_O_H_N [-J O H N-]
item.description:
@_J_O_H_N wrote:

[quote=“exps35, post:2, topic:172047”]make sure you’re on this setting with your brush.

Make one line that you like with the pen tool, then go to the brush tool. Choose about a 2-5 pixel white brush and make sure its hardness is 100%?

Then go back to the pen tool and right click it to ‘stroke path’ using the brush method.

Make them all onto seperate layers, then combine them when you’re done (excluding the background). Then you can go into the blending mode and change the options like ‘glow’ etc.[/quote]

thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this siggy

item.description:
@Unid_H4x0r wrote:

You know this is just: 1 brush stroke, render and txt?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with this siggy
item.dc:creator: @exps35 exps35
item.description:
@exps35 wrote:

make sure you’re on this setting with your brush.

Make one line that you like with the pen tool, then go to the brush tool. Choose about a 2-5 pixel white brush and make sure its hardness is 100%?

Then go back to the pen tool and right click it to ‘stroke path’ using the brush method.

Make them all onto seperate layers, then combine them when you’re done (excluding the background). Then you can go into the blending mode and change the options like ‘glow’ etc.

Read full topic
